HomePage.title: icyitegererezo cya next-intl
HomePage.description: Ikaze mu cyitegererezo cy'icyiciro cy'Igihugu (i18n) cya Next.js! Uyu mwitozo urerekana imbaraga z'App Router n'uburyo bwo gucunga neza ibikubiyemo mu ndimi nyinshi ukoresheje next-intl.

NotFoundPage.title: Urupapuro Ntiruboneka
NotFoundPage.description: Aho! Birasa nk'aho uhuye n'urupapuro rutaboneka. Ntugire ubwoba, ubukorikori bwacu bwo mu ndimi burakora ku bindi bice by'iyi porogaramu. Wikwibagirwa gusubira inyuma kugira ngo ukomeze gusura byinshi!
